JobTitle: Manager, Data Center Site Development Portfolio Manager
JobFullDesc: Facebook designs, builds, leases and operates the most innovative and efficient data centers in the world. Locating, developing and managing this data center infrastructure the "right" way is synonymous with ensuring high uptime, capacity availability, flexibility and capital and operational cost efficiency. Facebook is seeking a Manager to lead a group of experienced site development program managers responsible for supporting a portfolio of data center sites under construction or in operations to help manage its rapidly scaling owned and leased data center property portfolio of the sites that meets permit and agreement requirements and local expectations.  Key team activities include tracking and monitoring ongoing site development including agreement management (e.g., agreement compliance, offsite infrastructure tracking); assessing site risks and opportunities by compiling and/or analyzing site information, including permitting and land use requirements and legal, physical risk and financial implications; creating scalable processes to track risks at sites; and developing scalable, efficient tools and processes to improve delivery and communication for data center site development. A strong Manager, Data Center Site Development Portfolio Manager candidate has a keen ability to think both strategically and analytically, to assess issues from a global view, and to support a team of program managers to develop out-of-the-box solutions and navigate the challenges that accompany projects of large magnitude and scale. The Manager, Data Center Site Development Portfolio Manager is also tenacious, results driven and an excellent project manager.
